scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pieces included: 1 score, 1 submission letter, 1 biographical note, 1 program note. Notes: CD housed with Improvisation No. 1: Agitation. The CD and a duplicate of the score were in a manila envelope on which was written "Kentucky New Music Festival, Sop/Mz-sop submissions." Note on envelope: DN1.1 .07, Dn1.2 .04, DN1.3 .07. .
